skills.name: SHINE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of true damage to a single target.
• Gain Charge for 2 turns when you land a perfect hit.
• Transform each Golden effect on the target into a Mark for 1 turn when you land a perfect hit.

skills.name: BLOODY HAND
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• Damage dealt increases based on your MISSING HP.

skills.name: SHADOW OF SIN
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• 45% Chance to inflict Blind on all enemies for 2 turns.
• Grant a Force Shield to all allies for 3 turns.
